assets

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • assets.Sprite
      • assets.Player

  • public class Player
extends Sprite
    Class used to create player's character
    See Also:
    Sprite

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int animationFrame
      Secondary variable for imageList to determine which sprite to use.
      private int duckingHeight
      Height of player while ducking.
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Image> duckingSprites
      ArrayList containing all frames of animation for ducking player sprites.
      private int floorLevel
      Height at which floor is.
      private int gameHeight
      Program's window height.
      private int gameWidth
      Program's window width.
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Image>> imageList
      ArrayList containing all other ArrayLists with frames of animation of the player.
      private boolean jumpAvailable
      Player can jump.
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Image> jumpingSprites
      ArrayList containing all frames of animation for jumping player sprites.
      private boolean jumpKey
      Jump key(Arrow UP) pressed.
      private java.applet.AudioClip jumpSound
      Sound made while jumping.
      private int standingHeight
      Height of player while standing.
      private int standingOrDucking
      Variable for imageList to determine which sprite to use.
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Image> standingSprites
      ArrayList containing all frames of animation for standing player sprites.
      private boolean standingUP
      Player is standing up from ducking.

        height, image, visible, width, x, y

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player()
      Constructor for Player class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void animationFrame()
      Changes animationFrame variable, based on Game.mainTimer and sets new image using setImage() afterwards.
      private void initPlayer()
      Loads images from resources folder and adds them to appropriate ArrayLists and ads those list to imageList array.
      void keyPressed(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
      This method detects when user presses the key and takes actions based on the key pressed and other variables in class.
      void keyReleased(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
      This method detects when user releases the key and takes actions based on the key pressed and other variables in class.
      void move()
      Changes y position of the player, sets limits on how high he can jump and makes sure player will come back to floorLevel after jumping.
      void obstacleHit()
      Moves player back after he comes in contact with an Obstacle.
      void powerup()
      Moves player forward after he comes in contact with a Powerup.
      private void setImage()
      Sets image from Array list for each frame based on standingOrDucking and animationFrame.
      private void setPlayerSound()
      Sets sound of jumping based on game options Game.getSoundOption().

      • Methods inherited from class assets.Sprite

        getBounds, getHeight, getImage, getImageDimensions, getWidth, getX, getY, isVisible, loadImage, setVisible

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player()
        Constructor for Player class. Sets starting position of the player and uses initPlayer and setPlayerSound method.

    • Method Detail

      • initPlayer

        private void initPlayer()
        Loads images from resources folder and adds them to appropriate ArrayLists and ads those list to imageList array.

      • setPlayerSound

        private void setPlayerSound()
        Sets sound of jumping based on game options Game.getSoundOption().
        See Also:
        Game

      • setImage

        private void setImage()
        Sets image from Array list for each frame based on standingOrDucking and animationFrame.

      • animationFrame

        public void animationFrame()
        Changes animationFrame variable, based on Game.mainTimer and sets new image using setImage() afterwards.

      • move

        public void move()
        Changes y position of the player, sets limits on how high he can jump and makes sure player will come back to floorLevel after jumping.

      • obstacleHit

        public void obstacleHit()
        Moves player back after he comes in contact with an Obstacle.
        See Also:
        Game.checkCollisions(), Obstacle

      • powerup

        public void powerup()
        Moves player forward after he comes in contact with a Powerup.
        See Also:
        Game.checkCollisions(), Powerup

      • keyPressed

        public void keyPressed(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
        This method detects when user presses the key and takes actions based on the key pressed and other variables in class.
        Parameters:
        e - parameter provided by KeyListener

      • keyReleased

        public void keyReleased(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
        This method detects when user releases the key and takes actions based on the key pressed and other variables in class.
        Parameters:
        e - parameter provided by KeyListener
